github actions: update recommended Rust to 1.56.1
github actions: update recommended Rust to 1.56
Make DmOptions Copy
body: Make DmOptions ```Copy``` since we can expect it to be just 2 bitflags more or less for ever. Have the ```set_*``` methods take ```self``` and return ```self```, rather than taking and returning ```&mut self```. Pass ```DmOptions``` parameters as values everywhere. For something as small as ```DmOptions``` that seems a better approach.

title: Also specify patch version for dependency
Generalize DmDevice::suspend and status() functions to take a DmOptions argument
body:
Closes #663 

Generalize ```DmDevice::suspend()``` and ```status()``` functions to take a ```DmOptions``` argument. Many other, device-specific functions invoke ```status()``` or ```suspend()``` methods, in many cases hard-coding the ```DmOptions``` argument that is passed; no effort is made here to generalize these functions as I believe that the code there may require a significant redesign.
